channel.title: Pages on hacklab.no
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on hacklab.no

item.description: About Me I just want some place to give back to the community and help people learn. That is the reason i put up this blog. I am a Professional Security Researcher by day… and mostly by night, based in Sweden. This is intended to be a platform where i store and share various helpful bits of documentation that i come across.
